products.name: Modern Office Desk
products.description: Sleek and minimalist design perfect for your home office. Features durable construction and ample workspace.

products.name: L-Shaped Corner Desk
products.description: Maximize your corner space with this L-shaped desk. Perfect for multi-monitor setups and large workspaces.

products.name: Standing Desk Frame
products.description: Electric height-adjustable frame for creating your perfect standing desk setup. Compatible with most desktop surfaces.

products.name: Kids Study Desk
products.description: Ergonomic desk designed specifically for children. Features rounded edges and adjustable height.

products.name: Executive Office Desk
products.description: Premium executive desk with built-in storage solutions. Perfect for professional office environments.

products.name: Compact Writing Desk
products.description: Space-saving design perfect for small apartments. Features built-in cable management.

products.name: Premium L-Shaped Desk
products.description: High-end L-shaped desk with premium materials and built-in power outlets. Perfect for gaming and professional setups.

products.name: Gaming L-Shaped Desk
products.description: Designed specifically for gamers with RGB lighting and cable management system. Spacious surface for multiple monitors.

products.name: Kids Study Desk with Storage
products.description: Complete study solution for kids with built-in storage compartments and adjustable height. Made with child-safe materials.

products.name: Kids Creative Desk
products.description: Colorful and fun desk designed to inspire creativity in children. Features a built-in art supply organizer.
